rules_text:
When this land enters, sacrifice it. If you do, search your library for a basic Plains or Island card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
{1}{W}{W}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Counter target spell. You gain 3 life.
notes:

Constant creation and expansion have left some sections of the Weft peaceful, beautiful, and empty.

if uncommon: Silent Lakefront
